article.title: Northrop Grumman To Build Additional Global Hawk UAVs for U.S. Air Force
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: The U.S. Air Force has awarded Northrop Grumman Corporation a $302.9 million contract for five RQ-4 Global Hawk high-altitude, long-endurance unmanned aircraft systems. Under the production contract, the company will build two Block 30 systems and three Block 40 systems for 303rd Aeronautical Systems Group at Wright Patterson Air Force Base.
